## Discussion

Apple discourages using this method in iOS 15, tvOS 15, macOS 12, and watchOS 8 or later. Load associated tracks asynchronously using [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetTrack/loadAssociatedTracks(ofType:completionHandler:)] instead.

# associatedTracks(ofType:)

**Instance Method**

Returns an array of associated tracks that have the specified association type.

## Declaration

```swift
func associatedTracks(ofType trackAssociationType: AVAssetTrack.AssociationType) -> [AVAssetTrack]
```

## Parameters

- **trackAssociationType**: The requested track association type.

## Return Value

An array of tracks matching the specified track association type, or an empty array if none are found.

## Discussion

Apple discourages using this method in iOS 15, tvOS 15, macOS 12, and watchOS 8 or later. Load associated tracks asynchronously using [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetTrack/loadAssociatedTracks(ofType:completionHandler:)] instead.

You can call this method without blocking the current thread after you’ve loaded the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetTrack/availableTrackAssociationTypes] property.

## Managing track associations

- **availableTrackAssociationTypes**: An array of association types that the track uses to associate with other tracks.
- **addTrackAssociation(to:type:)**: Creates a specific type of track association between two tracks.
- **removeTrackAssociation(to:type:)**: Removes a specific type of track association between two tracks.
